title: people who downvote without saying anything are insecure change my mind
body:
i am not brave enough to speak up but i have internet points to shun you whenever you speak up because i don't like you or your ideas
also i am very smart and everything i downvote is an obvious lie because i am an omniscient god with a lof of experience
did i mention that i never got banned on boards and all rioters and mods are my friends?
